item.title: 南非势头强劲，兰特跃升至三年新高
item.description: 新年伊始，南非兰特汇率攀升至 2022 年以来的最强水平，这主要得益于包括持续经济改革和金属价格上涨在内的南非发展趋势。【原文：South Africa’s rand kicked off the new year by climbing to the strongest level since 2022, backed by upbeat South African trends, including continuing economic reforms and rising metals prices.】

item.title: 市场关注西非天气，可可期货大幅波动
item.description: 可可期货出现波动，因为交易商正在关注西非哈曼季节对主要生产国产量的影响。【原文：Cocoa futures fluctuated as traders watch for the impact of West Africa’s Harmattan season on output from top producers.】

item.title: 科技公司登陆拉斯维加斯 渴望展示人工智能变革
item.description: 欢迎收看《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，劳伦-刘（Lauren Lau）将为我们介绍即将在拉斯维加斯举行的 CES 科技展。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Lauren Lau gets us prepared for the coming CES tech showcase in Las Vegas.】

item.title: 关税混乱、美联储降息，国债创 2020 年以来最大涨幅
item.description: 2025 年是国债市场自 2020 年以来表现最好的一年，因为美国贸易政策的转变抑制了经济活动，美联储也因劳动力市场状况疲软而下调了利率。【原文：The Treasury market in 2025 had its best year since 2020 as US trade policy shifts curtailed economic activity and the Federal Reserve cut interest rates in response to weakening labor-market conditions.】

item.title: 智利 11 月经济令人失望，尽管前景较为光明
item.description: 就在政策制定者以投资前景改善为由上调 2026 年经济增长预期几天之后，智利 11 月份的经济活动低于预期。【原文：Chile’s economic activity for November fell short of expectations just days after policymakers raised their 2026 growth forecasts citing a better investment outlook.】

item.title: 寻找 2026 年人工智能乐观主义的极限
item.description:
富达国际将人工智能称为未来一年股市的 "决定性主题"。【原文：

Fidelity International calls AI “the defining theme for equity markets” in the coming year.

】

item.title: Capstone 智利矿工罢工，铜产量创纪录，预期大增
item.description: 智利北部一家由 Capstone Copper Corp.运营的矿山的主要工会周五开始罢工，因为工会成员要求从创纪录的高金属价格中获得更大份额的意外之财。【原文：The main union at a Capstone Copper Corp.-operated mine in northern Chile began a strike Friday as members push for a bigger share of the windfall from record-high metal prices.】

item.title: 巴黎小麦期货在 2026 年首个交易日下跌
item.description: 巴黎小麦在 2026 年的第一个交易日走低，因为交易商继续分析多种信号，包括结束乌克兰战争的谈判和欧洲寒冷天气对作物的影响。【原文：Paris wheat nudged lower in the first trading session of 2026 as traders continue to parse multiple signals, including the negotiations to end the war in Ukraine and the impact of Europe’s frigid weather on the crop.】

item.title: Grok 在 "保障措施失误 "后发布未成年人性图片
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的人工智能聊天机器人 Grok 称，"保障措施的失误 "导致它在社交媒体网站 X 上发布了未成年人的性爱图片。【原文：Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence chatbot Grok said “lapses in safeguards” led to the generation of sexualized images of minors that it posted to social media site X.】

item.title: 印度批准 46 亿美元促进电子产品供应链发展
item.description: 随着纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）政府加大力度建设本地供应链并挑战中国，印度已批准 46 亿美元的电子元件投资。【原文：India has approved $4.6 billion in electronics component investments as the Narendra Modi government steps up efforts to build local supply chains and challenge China.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数在 2009 年以来最好的一年后首次触及 10,000 点
item.description: 英国富时 100 指数（FTSE 100 Index）有史以来首次突破 10,000 点，这是自 2009 年以来表现最好的一年。【原文：The UK’s FTSE 100 Index traded above 10,000 points for the first time ever, after wrapping up its best year since 2009 that was powered by a rally in banks and miners.】

item.title: 荷兰养老金改革如何波及债券市场
item.description: 荷兰正在对养老金进行全面改革，以适应人口老龄化和劳动力市场的变化，在劳动力市场上，人们不再为同一个雇主工作一辈子。【原文：The Netherlands is overhauling its pensions to adapt to an aging population and a labor market where people no longer remain with the same employer for their entire working lives.】

item.title: 瑞士支持的数据中心计划目标是在天然气资源丰富的阿尔伯塔省投资 80 亿欧元
item.description: 阿尔伯塔省的一个数据中心项目得到了欧洲公司的支持，其中一家参与公司的负责人表示，该项目在未来几年的价值可能高达 80 亿欧元（94 亿美元）。【原文：A data center project in Alberta that’s backed by European firms has the potential to be worth as much as €8 billion ($9.4 billion) over the next several years, says the head of one of the companies involved.】

item.title: 塞内加尔下调 2025 年经济增长预期，称国际货币基金组织（IMF）谈判取得进展
item.description: 塞内加尔下调了对去年经济增长的预期，这使其维持财政纪律的任务变得更加复杂，但塞内加尔表示，关于国际货币基金组织新信贷机制的谈判正在取得进展。【原文：Senegal downgraded its estimate for economic growth last year, complicating its task of maintaining fiscal disciple, but said that talks over a new International Monetary Fund credit facility were making progress.】

item.title: 英国工厂产出增长，行业摆脱税收担忧
item.description: 一项备受关注的调查显示，12 月份英国制造业产出连续第二个月增长，表明该行业正在摆脱预算前对可能加税的担忧以及捷豹路虎停产的影响。【原文：UK manufacturing output grew for a second consecutive month in December, according to a closely watched survey suggesting the sector is shaking off pre-budget fears of potential tax rises and the impact of the Jaguar Land Rover shutdown.】

item.title: 印度煤炭供应过剩迫使顶级矿商探索出口之路
item.description: 印度煤炭有限公司（Coal India Ltd.）已允许尼泊尔和孟加拉国等邻国的消费者参与其拍卖活动，这是该煤矿公司首次战略性地推动出口，以缓解国内日益严重的供应过剩问题。【原文：Coal India Ltd. has allowed consumers in neighboring countries like Nepal and Bangladesh to participate in its auctions, the miner’s first strategic push for exports as it looks to ease a deepening glut at home.】

item.title: 华盛顿特区最热门的新餐厅 Butterworths 的经营之道
item.description:
MAGA人群的热点。【原文：

The hot spot for the MAGA crowd.

item.title: Odd Lots：华盛顿最热门餐厅的经营之道（播客）
item.description: 今年早些时候，当 Odd Lots 团队来到华盛顿特区时，我们在一家名为 Butterworth's 的餐厅享用了一顿美味佳肴。事实证明，这家餐厅是 MAGA 人群最热门的聚集地之一，史蒂夫-班农等人经常出现在餐厅里。当然，餐厅在正常情况下是很难经营的，但在特区，政治周期一直在变化，不同的酒吧和餐厅会与特定的政治人物联系在一起。【原文：When the Odd Lots team was down in Washington DC earlier this year, we had a phenomenal meal at a restaurant called Butterworth’s. As it turns out, the restaurant is one of the hottest hangouts for the MAGA crowd, with Steve Bannon and others frequently seen in its dining room. Of course, restaurants are difficult businesses in normal conditions, but in DC, you have the added factor that political cycles are changing all the time, and different bars and restaurants become associated with specifi】

item.title: 欧洲股市追随全球涨势，2026 年伊始创历史新高
item.description: 欧洲股市在新年伊始创下历史新高，追随全球股市因经济增长持续乐观而出现的涨势，而矿业公司则因大宗商品价格上涨而反弹。【原文：European stocks began the new year at all-time highs, tracking gains across global equities on persisting optimism around economic growth, while miners rallied on higher commodity prices.】

item.title: 刚果将把 2025 年钴配额延期三个月
item.description: 刚果民主共和国的钴矿产商将可以把去年的出口配额延期至 2026 年，因为新程序的制定工作出现延误，导致无法发货。【原文：Cobalt miners in the Democratic Republic of Congo will be able to roll last year’s export quotas into 2026 as delays in setting up new procedures prevented shipments.】

item.title: 受经济增长风险影响，美国 30 年期国债收益率升至 9 月以来最高点
item.description: 由于对美国经济增长前景的乐观情绪抑制了对避险资产的需求，国债在 2026 年的第一个交易日下跌，30 年期国债收益率升至 9 月初以来的最高点。【原文：Treasuries fell on the first trading day of 2026, with the yield on 30-year bonds rising to the highest since early September as optimism about the US growth outlook damped demand for haven assets.】

item.title: 调查显示，亚洲高级投资银行家招聘人数猛增 60
item.description: 招聘公司 Maven Partnership 的调查显示，随着交易流量的回升，2025 年亚太地区高级投资银行家的招聘人数猛增 60%。【原文：Hiring of senior investment bankers jumped 60% across Asia-Pacific in 2025 amid a pickup in deal flow, according to a survey by recruitment firm Maven Partnership.】

item.title: 欧佩克成员国加蓬在评级下调几天后解雇财政部长
item.description: 加蓬总统布莱斯-奥利吉-恩圭马（Brice Oligui Nguema）在国家信用评级被进一步下调为垃圾级几天后解雇了国家财政部长亨利-克劳德-奥伊马（Henri Claude Oyima）。【原文：Gabon’s President Brice Oligui Nguema fired the nation’s finance minister, Henri Claude Oyima days after the nation’s credit rating was cut deeper into junk.】

item.title: 首席执行官不寻常的 "三星回来了 "言论推动韩国科技股反弹
item.description: 三星电子公司（Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd.）联席首席执行官引用顾客的话说 "三星回来了"，进一步推动了周五亚洲科技股的大涨，该公司股价创下六个月来最大涨幅。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co.’s shares gained their most in six months after its co-chief executive officer quoted customers as saying “Samsung is Back,” further fueling a broader Asian tech stock rally Friday.】

item.title: 英国国家统计局称，2025 年末英国房价意外下跌
item.description: 据一家顶级抵押贷款机构称，英国 12 月份的房价意外下跌，这表明房地产市场可能受到了工党增税预算案的影响。【原文：UK house prices unexpectedly fell in December, according to a top mortgage lender, in a sign that the property market may have been affected by Labour’s tax-hiking budget.】

item.title: 晚周期 "波动迫在眉睫，人工智能热情提振亚洲科技界
item.description: 在芯片制造商和人工智能相关公司的带动下，亚洲科技股以新的涨势拉开了今年的序幕。然而，投资者越来越担心，该行业的强劲涨势可能会进入一个更加动荡的阶段。【原文：Asian technology stocks kicked off the year with fresh gains, led by chipmakers and artificial intelligence-related names. Yet investors are growing more wary that the sector’s powerful rally may be entering a more volatile phase.】

item.title: 棕榈油因原油走弱和马来西亚棕榈油出口下降而下跌
item.description: 棕榈油连续第二个交易日下跌，创下两周来的最低点，原因是原油走弱和马来西亚出口下降。【原文：Palm oil fell for a second session, hitting the lowest in two weeks as it tracked weaker crude and declining Malaysian exports.】

item.title: 税收冲击 "引发评级下调，印度 ITC 损失 70 亿美元
item.description: 印度最大的卷烟生产商 ITC Ltd. 在政府上调烟草产品税引发券商下调评级后，市值缩水约 70 亿美元。【原文：India’s largest cigarette maker ITC Ltd. wiped out about $7 billion in market value after a government tax hike on tobacco products triggered a wave of brokerage downgrades.】

item.title: 印度尼西亚将从国有银行配售资金中挪用 45 亿美元
item.description: 印尼政府原计划将75万亿印尼盾（44.9亿美元）现金存入国有银行，但由于该举措对促进东南亚最大经济体的贷款影响有限，印尼政府将撤回这笔资金。【原文：Indonesia will pull back 75 trillion rupiah ($4.49 billion) of government cash it had planned to park in state-owned banks, citing the initiative’s limited impact on boosting lending in Southeast Asia’s largest economy.】

item.title: 2026 年伊始新兴市场股票大涨，韩国誓言外汇稳定
item.description: 新年伊始，亚洲新兴股市在科技公司的带动下上涨。大多数地区货币窄幅波动。【原文：Emerging Asian stocks advanced at the start of the new year, led by gains in technology companies. Most regional currencies traded in narrow ranges.】
